article: Miss Zhao is one of the most popular teachers in the school.Yesterday she came into the  _  with a big smile on her face.She said to her  _  that she was  _  to see they did well in the sports meeting.But  _  was not pleased to see the classroom last Saturday not as  _  as usual.She hoped they would clean the classroom every day. Wei Hua was on  _  yesterday.She said everyone was at  _  except Lin Tao.Then she told Miss Zhao about their  _  to the Great Wall last Sunday.Luckily the weather was  _  .They played games and had a picnic there.After Wei Hua  _  her talk,Miss Zhao began her lesson.
